price: Ntibonwa n’amaso y’ibiremwa kw’isi[17] mu gihe Yo Ibona ibiremwa vyose. Ni na Yo rero Rumenyi-Rudahishwa, Muhetuziwavyose!
arabic: لَّا تُدۡرِكُهُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرُ وَهُوَ يُدۡرِكُ ٱلۡأَبۡصَٰرَۖ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ
footnotes: [17] Ariko mu buzima bw’inyuma yo gupfa, abemeramana bazoyibona n’amaso ukuri kwamye.

meta.transliteration: lā tud'rikuhu al-abṣāru wahuwa yud'riku al-abṣāra wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
